5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Thawban said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘No person should lead others in prayer, then supplicate only for himself and not for them. If he does that, he has betrayed them.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب وَلاَ يَخُصُّ الإِمَامُ نَفْسَهُ بِالدُّعَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: The Imam should not supplicate for himself only
